title: Lazada Product Performance Daily Report
description: Daily report presenting the performance metrics for a specific product on Lazada

Product_Name.description: Name of the product being analyzed

Product_ID.description: Unique identifier for the product on Lazada

URL.description: URL link to the product on Lazada

Seller_SKU.description: Seller Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for the product

SKU_ID.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) identifier for the product

Visitors.description: Total number of visitors to the product page

Product_Pageviews.description: Total number of page views for the product

Add_to_Cart_Visitors.description: Total number of visitors who added the product to the cart

Add_to_Cart_Units.description: Total number of units added to the cart for the product

Add_to_Cart_Conversion_Rate.description: Conversion rate from product view to adding to cart as a percentage

Wishlist_Users.description: Total number of users who added the product to their wishlist

Wishlists.description: Total number of times the product was added to wishlists

Buyers.description: Total number of buyers who made a purchase for the product

Orders.description: Total number of orders placed for the product

Units_Sold.description: Total number of units sold for the product

Conversion_Rate.description: Conversion rate from product view to purchase as a percentage

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'
